channel.title: Ind.ie News
channel.description: The latest news and updates from Ind.ie

item.title: The Social Web: A Glorious Dystopia
item.description:
This week we're going to dive straight into the activities of those cheeky corporations. There's so much to share!

Read the full post on the Ind.ie blog.
item.author: laura@ind.ie (Laura Kalbag)

item.title: Fight for your right to (Crypto) Party
item.description:
Jo writes about her first ever Crypto Party experience in London.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie blog.
item.author: Jo Porter

item.title: Tethered Beings
item.description:
The roundup is back! Aral and I are settling into our new office in the shed, and I’ve been itching to share links with you all week.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie blog.
item.author: Laura Kalbag

item.title: Farewell Caspar
item.description:
We were sad to hear Caspar Bowden died this week. It’s a huge blow to our community, and every citizen who has, and will still, benefit from his tenacious work for human rights.

Read the full post on the Ind.ie blog.
